  He smiled and walked out the door and motioned for her to follow. He walked 
down the corridor. He saw the room which famine was at work. When he reached 
it he turned to famine..."Is all prepared?"
 Famine said in a crackly voice...."Yes my leader. All we need is a conductor 
to clone the spark. Do you have a spark to clone?"
